channel.title: Massive Bug, Can't log back in when logging out at duel arena
channel.description:
Server is [Pi] [317] And basically when you log out at the duel arena waiting area your char does not dissapear and stays there, and you are unable to log back in as it says your character is already logged in. Only way you can get back in is if someone else logs onto the server S:, ive got no idea how to fix this.
also the server cmd starts going crazy whenever someone does it and just keeps repeating this until someone else logs in.
http://img713.imageshack.us/i/dabug.png

item.title: Massive Bug, Can't log back in when logging out at duel arena
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Logitek:

its a nullpointer its where a null object is being referanced, i would say probly an error in ure destruct method, make sure the character is saved,removed then disconected in that order, honestly besides my 2 sense i have no idea sorry dude.

hmm im pretty sure its in the right order but where exactly can i make sure. Its strange and seems to be everywhere that you can challenge someone. Thanks for the help, hopefully someone can help me fix this S:

Read full topic
